Property.name: IP
Property.HelpText: Enter the IP and Port of the Multiworld Host

Property.name: PlayerName
Property.HelpText: Enter your Slot Name

Property.name: Password
Property.HelpText: Enter the Password for the Multiworld Host

Property.name: DeathLinkOverride
Property.HelpText: You can override the Death Link setting from the yaml.

Property.name: RingLinkOverride
Property.HelpText: You can override the Ring Link setting from the yaml.

Property.name: TrapLinkOverride
Property.HelpText: You can override the Trap Link setting from the yaml.

Property.name: MessageDisplayDuration
Property.HelpText: How long the Archipelago messages will display.

Property.name: MessageFontSize
Property.HelpText: Font size for Archipelago messages.

Property.name: InGameTracker
Property.HelpText: Display the in-game tracker when paused, always or never.

Property.name: ItemMessageColorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of color for Archipelago messages (item and hints).

Property.name: ItemMessageColorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of color for Archipelago messages (item and hints).

Property.name: ItemMessageColorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of color for Archipelago messages (item and hints).

Property.name: ShowChatMessages
Property.HelpText: Display chats messages in the bottom left corner of the screen.

Property.name: ShowGoalReached
Property.HelpText: Display a chat message when someone reaches their goal.

Property.name: ShowCountdowns
Property.HelpText: Display chat messages for the countdowns.

Property.name: ShowPlayerConnections
Property.HelpText: Display a chay message when players connect and disconnect.

Property.name: ChatMessageColorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of color for Archipelago messages (chat and countdowns).

Property.name: ChatMessageColorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of color for Archipelago messages (chat and countdowns).

Property.name: ChatMessageColorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of color for Archipelago messages (chat and countdowns).

Property.name: HomingAttackIndicatorEnabled
Property.HelpText: Adds an indicator for the homing attack, like in modern Sonic games.

Property.name: CompleteMultipleLevelMissions
Property.HelpText: Collect more than one check from levels if you beat the other requirements.

Property.name: EggCarrierTransformationCutscene
Property.HelpText: Enable Egg Carrier's Transformation Cutscene.

Property.name: AutoSkipCutscenes
Property.HelpText: Automatically skip every cutscene as soon as it starts.

Property.name: SkippableCredits
Property.HelpText: Allow skipping credits.

Property.name: NoLifeLossOnRestart
Property.HelpText: Prevent losing a life when restarting a level.

Property.name: ExtendRingCapacity
Property.HelpText: Changes ring capacity from 3 to 5 digits.

Property.name: ShowEntranceIndicators
Property.HelpText: When random level entrance in is enabled, show helpful indicators over the levels' door.

Property.name: VoiceMenu
Property.HelpText: Select which character's voice will be used for the menus.

Property.name: DisplaySubtitlesForVoiceReactions
Property.HelpText: Display subtitles for the voice reactions when receiving items or traps.

Property.name: EggmanOnTrap
Property.HelpText: Play an Eggman voice clip when receiving a trap. Note: turning off all trap voice lines will just play "GET A LOAD OF THIS".

Property.name: OtherCharactersOnTrap
Property.HelpText: Play voice clips from other characters when receiving traps.

Property.name: CurrentCharacterOnTrap
Property.HelpText: Play voice clips of the current character reacting when receiving traps.

Property.name: EggmanOnUnlock
Property.display: Eggman voice clips for character unlocks
Property.HelpText: Play an Eggman voice clip when receiving a character unlock.

Property.name: UnlockedCharactersOnUnlock
Property.HelpText: Play voice clips from the unlocked character for themselves.

Property.name: CurrentCharacterOnUnlock
Property.HelpText: Play voice clips of the current character reacting when unlocking a character.

Property.name: EggmanOnKeyItem
Property.HelpText: Play an Eggman voice clip when receiving a key item.

Property.name: TikalOnKeyItem
Property.HelpText: Play a Tikal voice clip when receiving a key item.

Property.name: CurrentCharacterOnKeyItem
Property.display: Current character reacts to key items
Property.HelpText: Play voice clips of the current character reacting when receiving a key item.

Property.name: StatGainMultiplier
Property.HelpText: How much the animals, and fruits increase chao stats. Note: do not mix with the Mod Manager Code.

Property.name: TrackerArrow
Property.HelpText: Show a tracker arrow that points towards the closest unchecked enemy or capsule.

Property.name: TrackerArrowToggleable
Property.HelpText: Allows toggling the tracker arrow by pressing the whistle button.

Property.name: TrackerArrowShowDistance
Property.HelpText: If enabled, the arrow will be smaller and transparent when the target is far away.

Property.name: TrackerArrowOverrideColor
Property.HelpText: Overrides the arrow color with the indicator color of the target.

Property.name: TrackerArrowR
Property.HelpText: Red value of the color for the tracking arrow.

Property.name: TrackerArrowG
Property.HelpText: Green value of the color for the tracking arrow.

Property.name: TrackerArrowB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of the color for the tracking arrow.

Property.name: EnemyIndicator
Property.HelpText: Show an indicator over the enemies to help track them.

Property.name: EnemyIndicatorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of the color for the enemy indicator.

Property.name: EnemyIndicatorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of the color for the enemy indicator.

Property.name: EnemyIndicatorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of the color for the enemy indicator.

Property.name: CapsuleIndicator
Property.HelpText: Show an indicator over the capsules to help track them.

Property.name: CapsuleIndicatorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of the color for the capsule indicator.

Property.name: CapsuleIndicatorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of the color for the capsule indicator.

Property.name: CapsuleIndicatorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of the color for the capsule indicator.

Property.name: FishIndicator
Property.HelpText: Show an indicator over the fish to help track them.

Property.name: FishIndicatorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of the color for the fish indicator.

Property.name: FishIndicatorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of the color for the fish indicator.

Property.name: FishIndicatorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of the color for the fish indicator.

Property.name: ProgressionItemIndicator
Property.HelpText: Override the indicator's color when the check contains a progression item.

Property.name: ProgressionIndicatorR
Property.HelpText: Red value of the color for the progression item indicator.

Property.name: ProgressionIndicatorG
Property.HelpText: Green value of the color for the progression item indicator.

Property.name: ProgressionIndicatorB
Property.HelpText: Blue value of the color for the progression item indicator.
